title: Respond to an Emergency Breakdown
description: A conveyor belt has suddenly stopped. A maintenance technician needs to respond to the corrective maintenance call.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the high-priority maintenance ticket from the CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management System).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the ticket, indicating they are responding.

tasks.description: Diagnose the fault by inspecting the motor and drive system of the conveyor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician finds a snapped drive belt.

tasks.description: Replace the broken belt, test the conveyor, and close the maintenance ticket, logging the cause and resolution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent replaces the part, confirms the machine is running, and closes the ticket with notes.
